name: Neon Jump (monkeyjoe1031)
description: this is my first game, it took me about a couple weeks to make it. i reqlly hope that you enjoy it and have fun! im probably going to make more games in the future so be ready for that. if i can update a game on itch.io i will, but there are gonna be updates to this game (you probably already found the exploit). anyway, i hope you like it and have fun.
